item.title: 8.2 Mounting and using FSS on a Linux VM
item.description: 8.2 Mounting and using FSS (File Storage Service) on a Linux VM Constraints Even if File Storage is the same subnet as Compute Instance, the following rules must be set in the Security List to open the File Storage firewall. Create Subnet Open the navigation menu in the OCI console. Go to Networking » Virtual Cloud Networks. Click on ExampleVCN, the VCN you created earlier. Click Create Subnets Enter creation information: Enter only bold text fields and use default values ​​for the rest.

item.title: 10.4 Creating a Subnet for a Load Balancer
item.description: 10.4 Create Subnet for Load Balancer Create Subnet Open the navigation menu in the OCI console. Go to Networking » Virtual Cloud Networks. Click LoadBalancerVCN, the VCN you created earlier. Click Create Subnets Enter creation information: Enter only bold text fields and use default values ​​for the rest. Name: Enter a name, Public LB Subnet Subnet Type: Select the default REGIONAL REGIONAL: This is a subnet that is globally located in the region, and has the advantage of being able to use the IP as it is in case of a Failover to another AD.
